46 #include "multi_threaded_node.hpp"

48 // Callback function that is executed at a fixed specified rate defined by the "timer_actuator_motors_"
52 void MultiThreadedNode::publisher_actuator_motors_callback()
53 {
54  /* // Extract current thread
55  auto thread_string = "THREAD " + string_thread_id();
56  std::cout << "\n\n";
57  std::cout << "PUBLISHER " << thread_string << std::endl;
58  */
59 
60  // Arm after ARM_START_TIME_SECONDS
61  if (time_current_ > global_params_.ARM_START_TIME_SECONDS && offboard_flag_ == 0)
62  {
63  // Change to Offboard mode
64  this->goIntoOffboardMode();
65 
66  // Arm the vehicle
67  this->arm();
68 
69  offboard_flag_ = 1;
70  }
71 
72  // Publish control input to the motors
73  if (global_params_.PUBLISH_ACTUATOR_MOTORS_FLAG)
74  {
75  // offboard_control_mode needs to be paired with actuator_motors commands
76  publish_offboard_control_mode();
77  publish_actuator_motors();
78  }
79 
80  // Disarm after DISARM_START_TIME_SECONDS
81  if (time_current_ > global_params_.DISARM_START_TIME_SECONDS && offboard_flag_ == 1)
82  {
83  // Disarm the vehicle
84  this->disarm();
85 
86  offboard_flag_ = 2;
87  }
88 
89 }
90 
91 
92 void MultiThreadedNode::arm()
93 {
94  publish_vehicle_command(px4_msgs::msg::VehicleCommand::VEHICLE_CMD_COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM, 1.0);
95 
96  RCLCPP_INFO(this->get_logger(), "Arm command send");
97 }
98 
99 // Sends a command to disarm the vehicle
100 void MultiThreadedNode::disarm()
101 {
102  publish_vehicle_command(px4_msgs::msg::VehicleCommand::VEHICLE_CMD_COMPONENT_ARM_DISARM, 0.0);
103 
104  RCLCPP_INFO(this->get_logger(), "Disarm command send");
105 }
106 
107 //Publish the offboard control mode
108 void MultiThreadedNode::publish_offboard_control_mode()
109 {
110  px4_msgs::msg::OffboardControlMode msg{};
111  msg.position = false;
112  msg.velocity = false;
113  msg.acceleration = false;
114  msg.attitude = false;
115  msg.body_rate = false;
116  msg.thrust_and_torque = false;
117  msg.direct_actuator = true;
118  msg.timestamp = this->get_clock()->now().nanoseconds() / 1000;
119 
120  publisher_offboard_control_mode_->publish(msg);
121 }
122 
123 /*
124  Publish a actuator_motors command
125 */
126 void MultiThreadedNode::publish_actuator_motors()
127 {
128 
129  px4_msgs::msg::ActuatorMotors msg{};
130 
131  if (time_current_ < global_params_.TAKEOFF_START_TIME_SECONDS ||
132  time_current_ > global_params_.DISARM_START_TIME_SECONDS)
133  {
134  msg.control[0] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
135  msg.control[1] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
136  msg.control[2] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
137  msg.control[3] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
138  msg.control[4] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
139  msg.control[5] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
140  msg.control[6] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
141  msg.control[7] = MINIMUM_VALUE_PUBLISH_MOTORS;
142  } else {
143 
144  /* // QUADCOPTER
145  msg.control[0] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_quadcopter_normalized[0];
146  msg.control[1] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_quadcopter_normalized[1];
147  msg.control[2] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_quadcopter_normalized[2];
148  msg.control[3] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_quadcopter_normalized[3];
149  msg.control[4] = 0.0;
150  msg.control[5] = 0.0;
151  msg.control[6] = 0.0;
152  msg.control[7] = 0.0;
153  */
154 
155  // X8-COPTER
156  msg.control[0] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[0];
157  msg.control[1] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[1];
158  msg.control[2] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[2];
159  msg.control[3] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[3];
160  msg.control[4] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[4];
161  msg.control[5] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[5];
162  msg.control[6] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[6];
163  msg.control[7] = this->getControl()->getControlInternalMembers().thrust_vector_normalized[7];
164  }
165 
166  msg.timestamp = this->get_clock()->now().nanoseconds() / 1000;
167 
168  msg.reversible_flags = 0;
169 
170  /*
171  std::cout << "\n\n";
172  std::cout << "PUBLISHED ACTUATOR MOTORS" << std::endl;
173  std::cout << "==========================" << std::endl;
174  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() time_current_: " << time_current_ << " s" << std::endl;
175  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_1 : " << msg.control[0] << std::endl;
176  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_2 : " << msg.control[1] << std::endl;
177  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_3 : " << msg.control[2] << std::endl;
178  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_4 : " << msg.control[3] << std::endl;
179  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_5 : " << msg.control[4] << std::endl;
180  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_6 : " << msg.control[5] << std::endl;
181  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_7 : " << msg.control[6] << std::endl;
182  std::cout << "publish_actuator_motors() motor_8 : " << msg.control[7] << "\n\n";
183  */
184 
185  publisher_actuator_motors_->publish(msg);
186 }
187 
188 /*
189  Publish vehicle commands
190  Parameters:
191  command Command code (matches VehicleCommand and MAVLink MAV_CMD codes)
192  param1 Command parameter 1
193  param2 Command parameter 2
194 */
195 void MultiThreadedNode::publish_vehicle_command(uint16_t command, float param1, float param2)
196 {
197  px4_msgs::msg::VehicleCommand msg{};
198  msg.param1 = param1;
199  msg.param2 = param2;
200  msg.command = command;
201  msg.target_system = 1;
202  msg.target_component = 1;
203  msg.source_system = 1;
204  msg.source_component = 1;
205  msg.from_external = true;
206  msg.timestamp = this->get_clock()->now().nanoseconds() / 1000;
207  publisher_vehicle_command_->publish(msg);
208 }
209 
210 // Change to Offboard mode
211 void MultiThreadedNode::goIntoOffboardMode()
212 {
213  // Change to Offboard mode
214  this->publish_vehicle_command(px4_msgs::msg::VehicleCommand::VEHICLE_CMD_DO_SET_MODE, 1, 6);
215 
216  RCLCPP_INFO(this->get_logger(), "Go into Offboard mode command send");
217 }
